title: Bangladeshi Foreign Secretary reassures their support to Sri Lanka at International Forums
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The Foreign Secretary of Bangladesh Mr. Md. Shahidul Haque reassured the support of Bangladeshi Government to Sri Lanka at international fora during his current tour in Sri Lanka. The visiting Foreign Secretary made this pledge when he called on President Mahinda Rajapaksa this morning (23 April)…
